NightLight::

Nighlight follow him cautoinsly with Trinity in arms, in the last 
moment she was several feets behind Aerotaur, ready to run in case 
that Gramps started to shot.

> ::Aerotaur::
>     "I'll be careful."  He walks to where Gramps is.  "You want to 
put the 
> gun down or do I have to take it from you?"
